casebody.data:
Lisa GARLAND
v.
Fred HATLEY, Clerk of Superior Court of Lincoln County, N.C., and the Administrative Office of the Courts, an agency of the State of North Carolina. No. 561P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. Vicki B. Rowan, Charlotte, for Lisa Garland. Valerie Bateman, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Fred Hatley, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th day of October 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of December 2005."
